website_summaries.verdict: It is perfect for those with limited mobility and/or skin sensitivity. The best shower chair on the market today.
pros: Swivels for easy entry and exit, seat is gentle on skin, armrests provide extra protection against slips and falls
cons: Expensive and needs a lot of room to swivel

website_summaries.verdict: It might be a little more expensive than other models, but this transfer bench pays off in terms of longevity. The waterproof padding lasts for years, not months.
pros: Foam cushions are heavy-duty and won't split
Easy to assemble, no tools required
cons: Control buttons located in front, between user's legs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, worth every penny, reduces falls in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Well this is a no-brainer, mother uses a walker she backs up to the set and sits down we buckle her up release the seat slide it back spin her around and she's in the tub no worries of falls or slips in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Rip off. The seat barely make it in the tub. The extension kit is 80 bucks for two pieces of aluminum that should have been on the bench to begin with. Then the height extension for 4 inches is another 6p bucks. So to make it work i need to spend another 140 bucks. RIP OFF
customer_reviews.author: L.Z.stress

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this - well worth the price!!!! The padded chair and arms are great for preventing skin tears Husband’s physical and occupational therapists were so impressed - they wanted the product info for other patients. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with malfunctioning product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my father who only has to use it when there is only one caregiver available. The item stopped working after the 2nd use and the return window is closed and there is no way to contact the seller. It was a pricey item so we are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom who can't walk and always had to have someone get her in and out of the shower, making it difficult and somewhat treacherous for all involved when surfaces were wet. This product has been very liberating for her as someone assists her onto the seat outside of the shower and she can do the rest on her own. She can't stop talking about it. The cushioned seat makes it very comfortable for her and isn't cold like the hard plastic shower chairs. Assembly was a breeze and it arrived very quickly. If anyone is on the fence thinking about this item, don't, I can assure you it is well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Angie E.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING problem-solver
customer_reviews.text: This bench was an answer to our concerns for my elderly aunt. It took her a while to figure out how to swivel the seat (pre-Alzheimers) but she eventually got it. She is having problems with the wonderful shower curtain (she panics) so if you are a caregiver with a patient who has never used a shower curtain you may want to factor that in during the training. I highly recommend this for anyone who is having mobility issues and even those who have declined mental capacity. This shower seat is a godsend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ischmah2

customer_reviews.title: Right out of box once assembled it had rough grinding ...
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box once assembled it had rough grinding and did not slide right. One arm would not lock and found out no return. Stay away!!!! No stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tlv

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 95 and could no longer step over the 4 inch water guard in the shower. She is very happy with the ease of the sliding shower chair. I do place a towel on the seat so that she doesn't stick to the plastic. Other than that, it slides and rotates easily. When we need to use the lift to set her on the shower chair, the arm moves out of the way. It's a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jone

customer_reviews.title: Solved our problems
customer_reviews.text: I am a Certified Home Health Aide who ordered this shower chair for a client with left side paralysis. When transfers onto the old shower chair became a safety concern, the occupational therapist recommended this one. We couldn't be more pleased with it. It was a breeze to assemble and is sturdily built. Both arms can be raised, it swivels in any direction, and it locks into place making transfers much easier. The two arms and a seat belt help keep my client securely on the chair. We definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have a very large shower with no sill this is not ‘as advertised’.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of things wrong with this ‘transfer’ bench. It is Definitely not for someone who wants to remain at least partially independent. With the legs outside the shower lip you are barely inside the shower and water goes everywhere. With the legs inside the shower The seat does not slide far enough out to make this useful for transfer from either a wheelchair or a walker. We were very disappointed and do not think this is worth the price we paid for it. Also, it takes a lot of strength or another person to slide the seat. I definitely do not recommend this unless you have a Japanese-style shower and flat floors.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned seat comfortable, 2 armrests great for standing up on crunchy knees.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a locking position halfway across the glide. Not quite as stable when rotated 90° as I'd like. Seat has no perforations. Have bought a different model with only one armrest but has a perforated seat with a cutout for easy rinsing of perineal area without having to stand.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Transfer bench makes showering safe and simple
customer_reviews.text: A prayer answered... We are caring for our 98 year old mother with arthritis. This mounts in (and across the edge of) the tub to allow Mom to swing her legs inside the tub safely for a seated shower. She sits outside the tub then easily slides into the tub/shower. We have a shower with the head on the end of a hose. It was easy to assemble. Although we dedicated a shower for this purpose, this transfer bench could easily be moved to another room when not needed for a specific person. This works well for us and appears that it will serve us well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Seated safe & secure while bathing...getting in & out of the tub.
customer_reviews.text: Patient has Parkinson's, limited mobility. This is a game changer. Fits in standard tub but allow patient to sit on it just like a chair, secure belt, then push the seat towards the tub, lock in place and swivel to face into the tub. SAFE & SECURE (Still need to guide legs over the side of the tub) Afterwards slide & swivel the seat - then able to dry patient, shave as needed all while safely seated. Very pleased with this purchase. No longer considering removing the tub.
customer_reviews.author: June G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible addition to my life. It has made transferring into the shower so easy. Before my husband had to lift me over on to the regular transfer bench, now we save his back I can sit and the seat turns and locks. he can then slide the seat over into the shower itself. Getting out of the shower is so incredibly easy now. I am so sorry I did not find this product sooner. I highly recommend this transfer bench as does my occupational therapist. She is now recommending it to her patients.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hand

customer_reviews.title: "THIS IS A GAME CHANGER"
customer_reviews.text: "THIS IS A GAME CHANGER" This transfer bench has opened the door for a better quality of life It offers a safe way to provide a shower for my family member who has poor strength in her legs, and can no longer step into a shower. "I recommend this to all caregivers".
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great product, manipulative pricing
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself works great and is very sturdy. However if you have a taller tub like mine, you will need to also buy the “optional” leg extension kit for $65. This is not a “kit” at all but rather a set of longer legs. It would have been nice to have been able to just pay slightly more and choose the longer legs rather than buying longer legs separately. Surely the extra 3” of steel in each leg doesn’t amount to $65, and besides, I have no use for the four shorter legs that came with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The Best We Have Seen
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a bath/shower chair that lives up to its advertisements and Reviews!! We have gone through two different chairs, both barely acceptable and now we have a chair that makes it so easy for my wife to slide into a bath/shower with very little physical effort and wasted energy. (She has extreme Neuropathy). The sliding chair is well built, and has easy to follow instructions can be assembled without any tools and takes less than 10 minutes to have it fully functional. Need a bath/shower chair for an elderly or handicapped individual? Look no more. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Deep Diver

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for relative with Parkinson"s
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent chair for those that have disabilities. My mother- in- law has been able to leave the nursing home with 24 hour care. The Shower Chair / Bench no longer was a viable option for her safety. She loves the comfort foam and the easy ability to turn. The chair also has a safety belt. A nice addition. It is wonderful to have your loved one enjoying their shower and looking forward to it. This was not the case for our old shower bench. Thank you for making a fine product. By the way it was vey easy to assemble and there are many options to adjust the height of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sievewright

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I hoped for. My mom is 90 years old. She has an accessible shower at home but travel can be problematic. We went to the beach and the hotel rooms did not have handicap accessible bath. I purchased this for the next time we travel. I put it together in about 5 minutes. It is very sturdy and easy to swivel. The price is very good for this product. It is light enough for travel. Also a bonus- she can use it daily at home as it makes an ideal exercise seat for her chair yoga for her as well. A very nice product CMullins,Family Nurse Practitioner
customer_reviews.author: crm

customer_reviews.title: This one is sturdy, i like the swivel chair
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once, i just recieved it... i looked at all of them from $59.99-$299.00 This one is sturdy, i like the swivel chair, the seat is very padded and comfy, i am a bbw and was concerned i wouldnt fit well... i fit just fine.... the handles help my balance due to my 2 hip replacement issues... the sliding seat is smooth... i am very satisfied with it at this point...it was also very simple for my son to put together. I HAVE NOW USED IT FOR A MONTH AND I LOVE IT. IT WAS A GREAT INVESTMENT. WORTH THE EXTRA MONEY... DONT BUY THE CHEAP ONE. THIS ONE IS STURDY AND WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: sue carse

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Mega easy to assemble but read the instructions on how it moves (the seat swivel and how it moves & slides on the track). This has been invaluable now that my mom is disabled. She has a "lip shower" which is too much for as it is now hard for her to stand. This will work in a tub. The aides have been showing it to each other and recommending it to their clients who would benefit from its use.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A BACKSAVER!
customer_reviews.text: MY MOTHER'S DEMENTIA/ALZHEIMER HAS TAKEN HER ABILITY TO WALK. GETTING HER INTO THE SHOWER WAS A PAIN IN THE BACK, ESPECIALLY GETTING HER FEET OVER THE SPLASH LIP. MUCH SAFER PROCESS NOW! NOW, I CAN SIT HER ON THE SEAT, SLIDE HER INTO THE SHOWER, AND SWING HER RIGHT INTO POSITION. THIS PRODUCT EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS FOR DURABILITY, EASE OF OPERATION, AND VALUE FOR THE MONEY. THANKS AGAIN!! I WILL CHOOSE THIS COMPANIES PRODUCTS IN THE FUTURE!
customer_reviews.author: ROY U.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly...
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to put together, works and slides perfectly. I bought this for my husband who has gone thru a partial leg amputation and it works beautifully for him. The way the seat swivels facing out so he can sit down without a problem then swivels to the front so all he has to do is slide into the shower is terrific. He feels safe and secure along with the warm comfortable chair he sits in. The chair isn't cold, and if you want to feel safe and secure while taking a shower, this I recommend to you highly
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: Received today and my husband loves it. He is 6'7" and weighs 130 pounds. He has always had problems sitting on bath chairs. The seat is soft enough to sit on without pain for him. With the arms he can transfer from his wheelchair to the bath, swivel it and get in and out of the tube without help. The chair is easy to put together and adjust the legs to fit in the tub. It swivels easily and the controls for sliding and swiveling are easy for him to reach and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Ocie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! I have secondary progressive multiple sclerosis and I have an aide who helps me shower. This chair made it so easy. She just plopped me on the seat, pushed me over, swiveled the seat and voila, I was getting clean! The seat belt is so much better than the Velcro belts on the other chairs I’ve had. No pinching or scratching. The padded seat was easy to wipe off when we were done and the smaller footprint is wonderful in my less than spacious bathroom. This chair has made me feel a little less helpless and that is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: tecww1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dad!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower bench because of my dad's mobility issues and the increasing difficulty we'd been having with showers. It's a lot easier now and my dad feels more comfortable and safe with this! The swivel and sliding motions of the seat are smooth, yet sturdy. Having handles on both sides of the seat is really helpful when sliding him into the tub, and the fact that the handles can be moved out of the way if necessary is ideal. Assembly was super easy with no tools required. I wish I would have purchased this sooner. Definitely worth the price for us!
customer_reviews.author: JDiHOQ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this if you have a small bathroom as it's not returnable. I had no idea. I am unable to use this. What a way to learn the hard way. Now I'm stuck with a brand new thing that is not returnable. Expensive lesson
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Haller

customer_reviews.title: THANKS SO MUCH  TO THE MAKERS Of SUPER DESIGNED CHAIR! IF YOUR IN NEED,DONT DELAY BUY ONE AND  THE PATIENT WILL FEEL GREAT,.
customer_reviews.text: This showers chair was my life saver. I have someone that recently was paralyzed, was told by professionals they’d never shower again.NOT OT, PT, & Home Health Aide would try it,they all said NO, Even all three together were afraid, said to dangerous. Only bed bathes. I checked this chair out throughly, Bought it, brought it home and started showering my someone. We are very happy with it, squeaky clean and it WORKS SO GREAT! Makes you FEEL SUPER CLEAN AGAIN UNLIKE A BEDBATHE LEAVES YOU. 🙂 A real person again. Gives you back some of the lifestyle you lost! Thanks Platinum Health, your the Best!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: This company has several wonderful, smart products helping people with disability. The Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat is an incredible product. It has two arms for security, adjustable to the hight of the person, it is stable construction and smoothly slides the person over the bathtub to be able to shower. The company truly takes care of their customer; they immediately contacted us to ask if we need help with putting the bench together and if we are fully satisfied. It was a pleasure to work with them.
customer_reviews.author: Musical

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble, comfortable, stable, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad we chose this product. My elderly mother had a standard bath seat, but we were advised to get one that did not require her to step over the "wall" of the tub. This product was exactly right. I took less than 10 minutes to put together, was very easy for her to learn to use, and it provides maximum stability. The "upholstery" is soft & comfortable - it doesn't feel cold or hard. Another really good thing about buying this is that the company has been proactive in following up to ensure that the product arrived in good condition, was easy to assemble, and worked as we wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Layni Craver

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I bought this seat.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I ordered this shower transfer seat. I have a hard time picking up my body to scoot over on a seat. I need a seat with a back when I’m lifting my legs over the tub’s side or I lose my balance and fall backwards. Most transfer seats have a fixed seat that you have to scoot over to. I love the pivoting seat. It turns and slides so smoothly and the seat is so soft and comfortable. The seat also has arms on both sides which assist me when I’m getting out of it. I know it’s pricey but it sure beats a cold, hard plastic seat.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: The best and the worst simultaneously.
customer_reviews.text: Button in front is awkward for person using the chair to push and embarrassing as heck for someone else to try to push. Still, it's the best way to get someone into a shower. Move the button!
customer_reviews.author: NancyBR

customer_reviews.title: Bath transfer
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well! We were able to give my husband a shower without him falling. Loved the swivel feature! He is gone now, but this bench held up just like new!
customer_reviews.author: lj from Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Best shower chair on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product for anyone who is unable to get into the shower without assistance. We bought for our family member who was scared of the traditional shower chair bench. Bought this and Viola! Our family member loved it and was not afraid to take showers anymore. It is easy to place in the shower, it swivels with easy and locks into place. The padding on the chair alleviates pressure points and makes it comfortable for the patient. This product is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Keiffer

customer_reviews.title: This is the nicest and highest quality transfer bench available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and comfortable. It looks like a lot of thought was put into it. I love the smooth swivel feature, the padded seat & arms, and also the movable arms feature to allow easy side loading/unloading. This is probably the safest transfer bench as the other benches I have seen on amazon have cheap slippery hard plastic seats, where one can slide off. Comes with a seatbelt for even more security. The chair locks into place at either end. A feature I would have liked to have is adjustable sliding rods. I would have liked to adjust the length for a little more sliding room. Overall, a very high quality product and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: E reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but could be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 95 year mother (under 5' and 80 pounds) who can't stand anymore. Easy to assemble - the concept is good, but the seat is not deep enough (even as little as she is), she slides forward and the arm handles need to be taller as she leans from side to side and she could fall off from the side. Unless there are two of us positioning her on the chair, it would easily topple over as there is no way to firmly stabilize it. For the money, it could be sturdier -
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A well made product
customer_reviews.text: The Carousel Sliding Transfer Seat is an excellent product. It is well built with excellent features and easy to assemble. The cups on the legs can be turned so it is easy to stabilize the transfer seat. So far there have been no negatives for us on this transfer seat. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made a world of difference
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had brain surgery which left her with severe left side weakness. This transfer bench made all the difference in the world. She is now able to transfer to the seat on the transfer bench outside of the show with out having to try and navigate the shower step. She then rotates, sliced in to the shower and rotates to face the shower, easy peasy. I did order the 4" rail extensions, so check your shower or tub dimensions to avoid waiting for additional parts.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower bench for those with a disability!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was purchased by an 88-year old woman who lives in my home who has cerebral palsy. She didn't feel safe using the one that had belonged to my late husband, so I found this one online. It is exactly what she needed. She says she loves it and feels safe. Since it swivels, she can now just sit down with it turned to the side, then I or one of her other caregivers simply turn it back forwards and slide it into the tub. I have never seen a better shower bench for someone who is disabled!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Easy for one person
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to assembly light weight and very easy to swing my mother into position of tube. I am very satisfied with this chair so far. My mother is very small 4’ 9” but 200 pounds. She cannot left her legs so the standard transport bench is impossible for one person to get her into the tub. Since this chair has the swivel seat, she can sit then you turn seat side ways then slide into the tub helping her to lift her legs as she travels. What a blessing. Now the caretakers are happy and I’m happy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use. It comes assembled already.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!!!! This has saved our backs! My mother Inlaw has a traditional shower bench but suddenly she stopped walking and couldn’t get in the shower. This saved us $8,000 in bath to shower remodeling cost. All we do is sit her on the chair, move it back, swing her in and voila!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Olukoya

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT THE DOCTOR ORDERED!
customer_reviews.text: The significant features of the Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat are many. As an engineer, I recognized the quality of workmanship and design. We used it successfully on the occasion of our patients first shower. iI was easy to use, comfortable and safe for her, and she enjoyed her first shower. UPDATE 10/05/2020 Now after more trips to the shower, we can see that the Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench is going to be a great asset in care of our patient. It is safe, comfortable, and the patient really enjoys these trips.
customer_reviews.author: X911MAN

customer_reviews.title: Other then that chair works very good and well made
customer_reviews.text: Have to relocate the swivel knob and slide lever from between the leg of the patient to the side of the chair. Very awkward placing your hand there to help the patient. Other then that chair works very good and well made !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another simple shower chair for my husband some time ago. it seemed it was becoming to difficult for him to get into shower and sit on it. Along came this chair and WOW...what a difference. He is able to get on the chair then in the shower much easier. I would recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but elderly mom is pleased...
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mother lives independently and this added a measure of safety for her to bathe in her tub/shower. Setup and use is relatively easy. She is very happy. It did take her a while to adjust the shower curtain to keep water off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Stude Jim

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally a lifesaver for me. When using a regular shower chair I had to push up very hard (which often made the chair wiggle) to get up. Then I had to let go and turn to grab my rollator. Just a disaster waiting to happen. I've already fallen multiple times and had one broken bone. I feel SO safe with this chair. I no longer dread getting in the shower. It was also easy to put together. I did it totally by myself while sitting in a wheelchair. It didn't take very long at all. With someone more mobile than I am it would only take a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Cre Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub assistant!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working great. We are caretakers for my mother-in-law who has had several strokes and congestive heart failure along with stroke induced dementia. Our only question is, why didn’t we go with this sooner?! No confusion for her on this. She sits, we slide it and all she has to do is lift her feet into the tub. Before with the tub chair she just had real problems understanding she had to slide herself over on the bench. Great product Thanks
customer_reviews.author: L. Slimp

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Item is well made, sturdy and easy to use. My husband is about 6' tall, 220lbs and felt unsafe on the plastic model we had. He loves this one, and the pivoting seat with handles was a game changer for ease of getting on and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Total loss how sad
customer_reviews.text: So I purchase this for my handicapped son after I received it I noticed that it said no returns if the purchase has been opened. It's too straight up and down for my son that is handicapped to be able to sit in it so I feel as though I've lost my money but thank you anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my showers safe!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I recently lost a lot of function in my legs and was terrified of showering despite having grab bars. This has fixed the problem, with its seatbelt along with very sturdy seat, construction and slide. One thing that’s come in very handy: I am also able to swivel it 180 degrees and slide so I’m facing the side wall of the shower tub where I have a mirror with a suction cup to shave.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Emilio Rebagliati

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as I am no longer able to use our walk-in shower without difficulty. We have another bathroom that only has a tub, so this looked like a good solution. My husband said it was easy to put together and it definitely is sturdy. Used it for the first time today and I could not be happier. Easy to use and I was not as fatigued after my shower as I had previously been. I would highly recommend this to anyone who, for whatever reason, needs assistance to shower safely . I know it is a bit expensive, but it is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this quality bench!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this product. It was easily assembled, and I quickly figured out how to use it. I had had a bathtub fall before I purchased this bench, and although I suffered no major injuries, it was a terrifying experience. This bench makes me feel absolutely secure. The quality is excellent. I am a plus-size 80-year-old who has had several joint replacements, and I use the bench regularly without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: C. Laws

customer_reviews.title: The family has told me that this chair is absolutely amazing. They are able to clean him completely and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in order for it to be used by my father-in-law and other family caregivers. The family has told me that this chair is absolutely amazing. They are able to clean him completely and most importantly, he can be moved safely and easily. The in-home therapists that have visited have said that they wish all their patients had this chair. Our family is very appreciative of such a great product. If you are looking to order for yourself or a loved one, please make sure you measure the height of the bathtub first to make sure you will have proper clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, versatile shower chair for mobility impaired persons
customer_reviews.text: This shower chair is an engineering marvel. It is well designed, light enough, but sturdy. The rotating/sliding seat is extremely useful. The padded seat is a plus. It’s fairly priced for its quality and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: GatorRay

customer_reviews.title: Not made for a deep tub.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product but at the highest position it’s only 18 inches. The top of my tub is 20 inches. So I had to use bricks to raise it up enough to clear the edge. I wish they made longer legs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: He can do this safely by his self with easy. I like it as it's not heavy easier ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to use a slide board to move from one thing to another, such as bed to wheelchair; wheelchair to toilet. The transfer bench makes it so much easier for him to do this in the shower. He can do this safely by his self with easy. I like it as it's not heavy easier for me to move from one area to another. This item works very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: JR Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy and easy
customer_reviews.text: Makes showering SAFE and easy. Works very well. My husband struggles with balance and mobility so getting into the shower was difficult and a cause for concern because of the potential for him falling and the obvious uncertainty on his part that he could get into the shower safely. This transfer bench made it so simple for me to help him to back up to the chair with his rollator walker, sit comfortably, and then be swiveled & transferred into the shower stall. Made the effort on his part and my part so easy and simple. Showering is no longer a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can bath safely
customer_reviews.text: I was getting bed baths before, and now I can bathe myself. This chair was easy to put together and adjust. It's a blessing. I just sit on it, swivel the seat and slide into the shower. When I finish bathing , just slide over, swivel back and use my walker to stand and leave the bathroom. I am really enjoying the freedom it gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Norris

customer_reviews.title: Wish we found this one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother is 90 and has late stage Parkinson's. It's hard for her to move. This chair is fantastic. This is our third shower chair and the padding on this is wonderful. The ability to pivot and slide in and out of the shower helps us a lot since we are transferring her from a wheelchair to the shower. The two handles really helps her stay in the chair and feel secure. I would recommend this chair to anyone. I tried it and loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SHOWER CHAIR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my absolute BEST Amazon purchases ever! I purchased one and have had others do so as well!! We ALL love using them; it makes getting in & out of the shower sooooo much safer & much more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: SpunkeyMama

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and her caregivers love it. The cyshioned seat makes it more comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 87-year old Mom. She loves it and her caregivers love it. The cyshioned seat makes it more comfortable than the sliding bench we replaced. The arms are great for assistance in standing and sitting. The sliding and pivoting mechanism is easy to use. Mom says, “It’s wonderful!”
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair Worth the money for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: This seat is adjustable in most every way. Expensive but you'l never need another one. Fits nicely on tub and sturdy. My father is tall and thin. He has a fear of falling but this seat has leg extensions that are sold separately that make the seat tall enough that he can easily get on and off the seat with a gentle slide into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than remodeling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 90 year old person who had trouble getting into the shower by stepping over the tub rail. I was originally going to replace the tub, but since i needed a working shower the same day decided against it. I looked into several options and a chair was the safest way to go. It has a roller on the seat where you can slide the person over into the tub. It even has a seat belt which comes in handy when sliding the person over into the tub. Yes, it is expensive but the alternatives were more expensive. It was easy to assemble out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and was assembled in just a few minutes. We've only been using it for a few days now but it seems very well built and works as advertised. We needed something to help us with a temporary living situation, but I would think this chair could be used as a long-term solution for people who need one. It is sturdy and slides smoothly. I especially like the adjustable leg feature, which helps level the chair and accommodate bathtubs with sloping walls. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Rice

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s expensive but significantly cheaper than a trip to the E.R.
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad balance and my bathroom is very small. The space between the shower and sink is not big enough to turn the walker around. I had both a bath chair and bench but they were both very unsafe because of the twisting I had to do. Getting in was hard, getting out was dangerous. This really makes it much easier and safer to get in and out. I should have bought this first and not wasted money on the chair and bench. They both will be in my next garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: JLWave

customer_reviews.title: Safety above all else
customer_reviews.text: My condition causes very limited mobility in my legs and after a harrowing experience in my shower stall when I started to slide off the shower stall bench, I purchased the Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat to use in my bath tub. Using the sliding/swiveling duo and the seat belt on it now makes my showering experience feel so much safer and eliminates my worry of how to get in and out of the shower stall. I do need to use my leg lifter and help to lift my legs over the side of the tub, but the security in my showering experience (with my hand held shower) has made me a happy purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat arrived yesterday. We set it up immediately (a little tricky but done nonetheless), and haven't one regret. Even our most skeptical aide can't stop exclaiming how much easier and safer it is to transfer my mom (89 with severe mobility issues.) This is a high quality product that is comfortable, safe and really does make the whole transfer process easy. WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TRANSFER BENCH.
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help make it easier for me and my wife to help bathe my mother. It’s expensive but worth every penny! If you are in the same type of situation I am helping your parents this will make the task much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my Carousel Siding transfer shower chair. It came a day sooner than expected which I really like. It was easy to assemble and fits in the shower perfectly and as soon as I use it I will update my review. But for now I would have to say that I highly recommend this for any one that needs assistance getting in and out of the shower. This is my updated. This product is fantastic just used it and I will say that it made showering much safe, less hassel and a much better showering experience. If you have some that needs assistance in the shower I highly recommend this for you to get.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Withers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this transfer bench for our mother who has mobility and fall risk issues. This product is amazing! It has helped her so much with feeling secure and safe while bathing. The bench is very easy to use, very sturdy, and is very comfortable for her to sit on. I highly recommend this product for anyone needing to address similar issues. A++
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for handy capped people.
customer_reviews.text: My mother had a stroke and is paralyzed on the left side and cannot get into a bath tub for the last 10 years until now. Great product. The seat is padded and very comfortable for my 80 year old mother. The chair slides Easley and is very stable. Everyone in the assisted living facility now wants one even her care takers think it great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ALS patient and caregiver
customer_reviews.text: Our recent purchase of a Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench has aided us tremendously. This item not only provides more comfort for showering, it enables the conservation of her energy which is very important to an ALS patient. This transfer unit has simplifies the effort needed to transfer the person into and out of the shower tub. The product is very durable and made with quality materials. As a primary caregiver of the ALS patient, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BobG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design. Top Quality. Total Bath Transfer Solution
customer_reviews.text: This sliding bath chair is pretty perfect. It is solid, well designed & well made. A total solution for someone in a wheelchair to get into & out of a shower, or tub. We also have their regular bath/potty chair & love it. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: KLT -Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more fear of falling
customer_reviews.text: After working through some indecisiveness, clearance issues, no in-store testing, etc. we finally bought this transfer bench for my father battling Parkinsons. This product was delivered on time and simple to put together. The sliding seat addressed the issue of being unable to slide across the seat of a previously purchased transfer bench. While he's still adapting, he feels more secure, a bit more independent and is able to bathe without the fear of falling,
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent transfer bench and support
customer_reviews.text: This transfer bench is attractive, well made, and easy to assemble. The product support is friendly and ready to help although we haven't needed any support. The seat is comfortable and the arm rests and back rests provide an important level of safety.
customer_reviews.author: LTC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money over other similar devices
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Purchased for my grandmother, whom my grandfather and I care for. The mechanical parts all work smoothly and easily. The seat material is much better than I expected. It's like a thick, firm, but also comfortable rubber like material that I think will hold up well. Much better than the other hard plastic ones I've looked at. Easy to put together, took about 10 minutes, and I was taking my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chair, easy to swivel and glide
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, bought this for my 93 year old mom. She has neuropathies and cannot walk without a walker. She can get in and out of the chair by herself- if you need to push down on sturdy handles to get up, this is perfect for you. The chair swivels and glides easily. At the same time, the frame is sturdy- if my mother can't tip it over, nobody can! The set up was simple.As others mention, that button between the legs is a bit weird! Don't cheap out- get this bath chair.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Carousel sliding bath chair
customer_reviews.text: I’m still learning how to slide the chair so it locks without my having to manually push in the locking button. Otherwise it has given me great peace of mind when it’s bath time for my 95-year-old aunt.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Edo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has mobility issues and we have had trouble getting her on a stationary transfer bench and moving her over inside the tub for her shower. This Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat is WONDERFUL. I was able to get her onto the swivel seat, push a button and turn her around to put her legs and feet inside the tub and then push a switch and slide her over inside the tub. The seat strap is also very helpful to avoid sliding forward on the seat. This product arrived timely and was easy to put together. I would recommend this product to anyone having mobility issues related to bathing.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: It works great!!!! BUT, if you have a whirlpool tub read this..
customer_reviews.text: I had foot surgery and needed a sturdy shower chair. It was easy to assemble and operate. However, the legs were too short as we have a “whirlpool tub.” Luckily, we located the leg extensions on the manufactures website and overnighted them. The leg extensions work perfectly and I highly recommend this product. To entrepreneurs out there, please offer the extension legs on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: KiMD

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put this together and is quite sturdy. It fits over the tub side well without extending too far into the room. It rotates and slides easily. My 93 year old father moved in with us and is a fall risk. This allows me to keep him safe without having to replace the tub with a shower because it allows me to slide him across the tub edge and use the wand shower. It's also easier on my back than other options I had researched. I wish the grey knob could be redesigned elsewhere because it's a little awkward having to reach between the person's legs...but safety first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option vs. costly bathroom renovation!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a great product, well-made, easy to use and works great! It shipped fast and was very easy to assemble. Nicely padded, sure beats hard plastic! It has more features that make it worth the cost; this saved us from having to have a costly bathroom remodel to remove existing tub so that my mom could be showered safely- her Homecare aides love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Rabak

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment Yet for My Peace of Mind!!
customer_reviews.text: This bath and shower seat is the greatest thing we've found to help my husband get over the side of the tub for his sit-down shower. He can transfer from his raised toilet seat to the seat of this device, swivel it so that he's facing the right direction for his shower as he lifts his legs over the side of the tub, and slide all the way in for his shower. Now I don't have to worry about him falling and hurting himself in the process.
customer_reviews.author: CalJan

customer_reviews.title: This chair is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is AMAZING!!! It's obviously pricey but you get what you pay for and this is something that gets used A LOT. My husband is a paraplegic and he can use this quite easily. Everything is so well thought out with the arm that drops, the seat that spins and slides and the feet that adjust in half clicks instead of the typical full click. You can also purchase a 100% lifetime warranty for $50 which I did as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nirvookix

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 95 year old in-laws. It works great. I just wish I found something similar 19 years ago to help me with my gramma and mom. Thank you for making a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramie

customer_reviews.title: Great shower chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this chair because he has trouble in the shower with being able to wash his feet. We are planning on putting in shower bars as well, but we haven't yet done so. This chair has made taking a shower much easier for him. He likes that it is not the hard plastic but is comfortable and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: Chair is being used by a 85 year old woman with mobility issues. She found the seat very secure and comfortable. The arm rests made her feel especially secure and helpful to stand up in the shower. The swivel action of the seat is a must to get in and out of the shower/tub. I found the chair very easy to assemble and to level. The visiting nurses were quite impressed with how easy it was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: This chair is just what my mother needed. She was recently released from the hospital and was still too weak to stand in the shower. I needed to get this for her while I was visiting. It arrived quickly, put it together in 15 minutes. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart J. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Less Stress at Bath Time!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench! I assist my mom with her bath but I'm always afraid she will slip and I won't be able to stop her from fallng. I have no fear of her fallng now as there is no more stepping in and out of the tub. This bench has taken the stress out of bath time, which is awesome because Mom is 101 and for her, no stress is good stress! I have no regrets that this is the one we chose out of several choices.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Klein

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a pricier slide bench, but totally worth it. It’s sturdy, easy to use, and even fits in the tub of a manufactured home. Very pleased with the bench and my very old father with mobility issues can now bathe safely.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for my disabled sister, and it has been a HUGE help. The seat slides outside the tub, then swivels & slides back in. It’s super simple to use & simple to assemble! I highly recommend this product for anybody who has trouble standing up in the shower or for anyone who is a fall risk. It is absolutely worth the money. 5 stars from this family!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for large people !!
customer_reviews.text: It is designed for smaller people of less than 150lbs and skinny. It worked for awhile until my wife fell forward and broke her femur. My wife weighs 180 lbs. The chair needs to be much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jib01

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver Shower Seat
customer_reviews.text: This shower seat is EVERYTHING!! As a caregiver for my mother, who has M.S. and cannot walk, this helps me to easily swivel her around to the inside of the bathtub. It maneuvers very easily and is a lifesaver when caring for an elderly person. I definitely recommend this item for your loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product and assitive device
customer_reviews.text: I use this item daily. It will keep you safe in the shower, as it is really stable when holding a transfer from a wheelchair. This item is great for me as I also use it a support when standing up, or when using the toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Ultra sturdy/nice shower chair
customer_reviews.text: Made out of very nice materials and fairly hefty, will not move around much when you bump into it. Wish there was a cutout but it doesn't have it due to the swivel (swivel feature is nice). A little pricey but you are getting quality here so I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: chair is sturdy and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The chair was delivered promptly and was very easy to assemble. my wife likes the security she feels while using this chair. before she used it Im did a test run for her ,I weigh at 190lbs and didn't have a bit of trouble using the pivot or the slide features. We didn't have to use the seat belt but you never know the future. We highly recommend this chair. Wish we had gotin one a few years ago,would have save a lot of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Leistman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect After a Hip Replacement
customer_reviews.text: As the caregiver of my 95-year-old mother, I ordered this so I can give her a daily shower after total hip replacement. It is PERFECT. I researched a lot of shower chairs, and this was the best for us.
customer_reviews.author: Birkeb

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST HAVE, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about paying the price of the "Carousel Sliding Shower Chair," doubting if it would really be that much better than others I compared to it. It met or exceeded all of my expectations. My Mom had a stroke leaving her unable to use her right side. We are now able to safely assist her with a real shower. This has made it safer & more comfortable for both my Mom & the her caregiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful shower bench. We are using it in a small walk-in shower. The user has limited mobility and getting in and out of the shower was very difficult. The Carousel Bench is safe, sturdy, easy to use, and comfortable. It is very high quality. We are grateful to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Improves Bathing Without Question
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how much easier it is to get by Dad a shower using this chair. He is nearly 103 years old and it was hard getting him in and out of the tub, let alone standing to completely shower. The swivel chair with arms is the key to making this task easy. It also allows him to feel more secure. The entire unit is fairly compact and lightweight. It is well worth the price. I would highly recommend it. Also I can not believe how fast it was delivered - withing 48 hours on regular mail service. Thanks for a great design!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Carousel Sliding Transfer Bench with Swivel Seat. Premium PADDED Bath and Shower Chair with Pivoting Arms. Space Saving Design for Tubs and Shower.
feature_bullets: - PROFESSIONAL GRADE sliding transfer bench, bath and shower chair. Effortless sliding and pivoting for safe, easy transfers in and out of the tub. Platinum Health products are used in thousands of hospitals, nursing homes and in private homes by customers who value quality, safety, convenience and comfort over price. Note: OPTIONAL LEG EXTENSION KITS AND HORIZONTAL TRAVEL EXTENSION KITS ALSO AVAILABLE.

-PADDED SEAT, BACK AND ARMRESTS. No more cold, slippery, hard plastic parts like old-style bath chairs; the Carousel provides warm to the touch, comfortable, slip resistant padding on all main components. The medical-grade, closed-cell molded polyurethane padding will not absorb any water and is easy to clean and disinfect. Quick TOOLS-LESS assembly in less than 5 minutes.

-SWIVEL-SEAT SPACE SAVING DESIGN. Not only is the swivel seat safer, easier to use and more comfortable than a standard fixed seat, this design means that the chair protrudes into the room much less than a traditional transfer bench. More convenient for the user, and more convenient for others that don’t require use of the chair since the free space in the bathroom is much greater.

-ROBUST, PIVOTING ARM RESTS. The padded arm rests can be raised and lowered and locked into place. Unlike standard chairs with no armrests, the robust armrests on the Carousel can be used as leverage points to help the user into and out of the chair. They also provide important additional physical and psychological support against slips and falls and fear of slips and falls.

-HI CONTRAST COLOR FOR SAFETY. Our unique HI-VIEW BLUE color makes the key parts of the chair much easier to see by vision impaired and/or dementia afflicted users. Rather than blending in with the background like old-style white benches, the blue contrast color helps users distinguish the chair from its surroundings and significantly reduces slips, trips and falls- the leading cause of death by injury in people over 65.
